comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The Embryo Project Encyclopedia at ASU has a different version of this photo (with a dog by her side!): embryo.asu.edu/view/embryo:125836

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: If the tentative ID is correct, this is her father: www.inhs.uiuc.edu/~ksc/Malacologists/WinkleyH.W.html
